description: This stuffing recipe is perfect for a Christmas turkey. Or just roll it into balls to serve alongside the Christmas dinner.

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Mix all the ingredients together. Either roll into balls or spread out evenly in a greased ovenproof dish. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown all over and cooked through.
tips: If you are making this as a dairy-free recipe, take care to ensure the breadcrumbs are dairy free. Although many breads contain dairy, free-from options are widely available - just check the label.
title: Sage sausage stuffing
